pages.text: $(li)The Snail Shell Piece is an item that can be used to craft new decoration blocks, a $(l:patchouli:decoration/alexsmobs/banner_patterns)Banner Pattern$(/l), and the $(l:patchouli:armors/snail_chestplate)Snail Shell Chestplate$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)It can only be dropped when a baby Snail turns into an $(l:patchouli:creatures/autumnity/snail)Snail$(/l).
